title: Romance Guide
content:
Marriko and Locke in the Druid Grove. Crush the tadpole outside of the Druid Grove. Convince the owlbear not to kill you in its cave. Tell Scratch (the dog) that he can come to your Camp if his friend doesn't wake up. Help Auntie Ethel when she's confronted by Johl and Demir. Agree to help Zevlor. Make Novice Crusher kiss your foot in the Goblin Camp. Help Karlach in the Hunt the Devil quest. Any sympathetic behaviors. Fight the fake god Boooal in the Festering Cove.

All Gale Approval Down Choi
